metadata.titleEn: SHRIMP U-Pb zircon ages and Hf-O isotopic data of Paleozoic ophiolites in Lincang Lancang area, western Yunnan
metadata.titleCn: 滇西临沧-澜沧一带古生代蛇绿岩锆石SHRIMP U-Pb年龄和Hf-O同位素数据
metadata.description: This data set includes SHRIMP U-Pb zircon dating and O isotope data of Banpo Yakou ophiolite in the eastern part of the Qinghai Tibet Plateau and western Yunnan. The data are from the research team of Zhai Qingguo, Institute of Geology, Chinese Academy of Geological Sciences. The formation and evolution history of the ancient Tethys suture zone in western Yunnan has always been the focus of Tethys research. In recent years, with the support of the second scientific research project, the team has carried out a detailed field geological survey of Banpo Yakou ophiolite in Lancang Puer area, western Yunnan. On this basis, based on high-precision (ion probe) U-Pb dating and O isotope analysis of zircon in gabbro and plagiogranite, The formation age of ophiolite in this area (313~305 Ma) has been recovered, and its O isotope is a typical depleted mantle source area（ δ 18O value is about 5.5 ‰). On this basis, combined with the whole rock geochemical study, it is considered that the ophiolites in this area are of typical back arc basin origin, and the Late Carboniferous Paleo Tethys trench arc system has been reconstructed. In addition, the data further include zircon Hf isotope of Banpo ophiolite and zircon U-Pb geochronology of Mengku Shuangjiang ophiolite recently obtained by the project team. These data were obtained by using high-precision secondary ion probe (SHRIMP II) at the Beijing Ion Probe Center, and zircon Hf isotope data were obtained by (MC) - LA-ICP-MS multi receiver plasma mass spectrometry. The data quality is excellent, and can be used for the comparative study of the formation and evolution of Tethys on the Tibetan Plateau and the evolution of the oceans.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据集包含了青藏高原东部滇西地区半坡-垭口蛇绿岩锆石SHRIMP U-Pb定年和O同位素数据，数据源自中国地质科学院地质研究所翟庆国研究团队。滇西地区古特提斯缝合带形成演化历史一直是特提斯研究的重点，近年来，在二次科考项目资助下，团队针对滇西澜沧-普洱一带的半坡-垭口蛇绿岩开展了详细的野外地质考察，在此基础上基于辉长岩和斜长花岗岩中锆石高精度（离子探针）U-Pb定年和O同位素分析，重新获得了该地区蛇绿岩形成时代（313 ~ 305 Ma），其O同位素为典型亏损地幔源区特征（δ18O值约5.5‰）。在此基础上，结合全岩地球化学研究，认为该地区蛇绿岩为典型的弧后盆地成因，并重建了晚石炭世古特提斯沟弧体系。此外，数据进一步包括项目组新近获得的半坡蛇绿岩锆石Hf同位素、勐库-双江蛇绿岩的锆石U-Pb年代学结果。这些数据均在北京离子探针中心利用高精度二次离子探针（SHRIMP II型）获得，锆石Hf同位素数据通过（MC）-LA-ICP-MS多接收等离子质谱获得，数据质量优良，可用于青藏高原特提斯形成与演化以及大洋演化对比研究。
metadata.instructions: The data is in Excel form, and the file naming principle is based on region+sample nature+analysis method+data content.
metadata.instructionsCn: 数据为Excel表格形式，文件命名原则根据地区+样品性质+分析方法+数据内容。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is SHRIMP U-Pb dating in the context of zircon analysis?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在锆石分析的背景下，SHRIMP U-Pb定年是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: SHRIMP U-Pb dating refers to a high-precision ion probe technique used to determine the age of zircon crystals by measuring the ratio of uranium to lead isotopes. This method is utilized to obtain geological dating, particularly in the study of ophiolites in regions such as the eastern Tibetan Plateau.
Definition.AnswerCn: SHRIMP U-Pb 定年是指一种高精度离子探针技术，用于通过测量铀与铅同位素的比率来确定锆石晶体的年龄。这种方法用于获取地质年代，特别是在东藏高原等地区的蛇绿岩研究中。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential outcomes of utilizing high precision ion probe U-Pb dating and O isotope analysis on zircon minerals for understanding the formation and evolution of ophiolites in ancient tectonic suture zones?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 利用高精度离子探针U-Pb定年和锆石矿物氧同位素分析来理解古代构造缝合带中蛇绿岩的形成和演化的潜在结果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Utilizing high precision ion probe U-Pb dating and O isotope analysis on zircon minerals can lead to a more accurate determination of ophiolite formation ages, which in the case of the studied region are identified as 313 ~ 305 Ma. This approach also provides insights into the O isotope characteristics, indicating a typical depleted mantle source (with δ18O values around 5.5‰), which helps in reconstructing the tectonic history and understanding the genesis of the ophiolites as back-arc basin origins. This data can be used in broader comparisons of Tethys evolution and oceanic processes.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 利用高精度离子探针U-Pb定年和锆石矿物的氧同位素分析，可以更准确地确定蛇绿岩的形成年龄，在研究区域中识别为313 ~ 305百万年。该方法还提供了氧同位素特征的见解，表明典型的耗竭地幔源（δ18O值约为5.5‰），这有助于重建构造历史并理解蛇绿岩的成因，作为后弧盆地的起源。这些数据可以用于更广泛的对比，研究特提斯演化和海洋过程。
